hero.title: Glow Lighting Company
description: Glow Lighting Company is helping to replace traditional lighting with more energy efficient solutions, providing smart LED light bulbs and sustainably made light fixture.
As a new company, Glow wanted their visual identity to be new, engaging and exciting. This branding would then guide the design of a new online store.

projectDetails.title: Logo
projectDetails.description: I designed a bold and minimal logo to represent their modern ethos, that could be transitional throughout their branding.

projectDetails.title: Colour Palette & Imagery
projectDetails.description: Inspiration for colour and imagery was taken from abstract but minimal LED lamps, leading on from the concept of providing a way to make traditional light more exciting.

projectDetails.title: Online Store
projectDetails.description: I created a clean and attractive website with an added light and dark mode feature to express the function of the product and to keep the customer engaged.

text: Most adoption processes are found to be challenging and intense. However, I have created a calm and friendly app for adoptions to be enjoyable, all in the palm of your hand.
Paw Adoptions can now help reduce the amount of unwanted animals with an online platform that is quick and accessible to pet lovers.
